me.taylorkelly.mywarp.limits

Interface LimitManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyLimitManager, SimpleLimitManager

    public interface LimitManager
    Manages Limits that control how much warps a user can create.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  LimitManager.EvaluationResult
      The result of a limit evaluation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LimitManager.EvaluationResult evaluateLimit(LocalPlayer creator, LocalWorld world, Limit.Type type, boolean evaluateParents)
      Evaluates whether the given creator exceeds limits on the given LocalWorld, testing against the given Limit.Type.
      java.util.Map<Limit,java.util.List<Warp>> getWarpsPerLimit(LocalPlayer creator)
      Gets all warps created by the given LocalPlayer mapped under the applicable Limit.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateLimit

        LimitManager.EvaluationResult evaluateLimit(LocalPlayer creator,
                                            LocalWorld world,
                                            Limit.Type type,
                                            boolean evaluateParents)
        Evaluates whether the given creator exceeds limits on the given LocalWorld, testing against the given Limit.Type.
        Parameters:
        creator - the creator
        world - the LocalWorld
        type - the Limit.Type
        evaluateParents - Whether parents of the given type will be evaluated too (recursively). This is useful if not just a specific Limit.Type might be exceeded, but also a more general limit that includes the given one
        Returns:
        an EvaluationResult representing the result of the evaluation

      • getWarpsPerLimit

        java.util.Map<Limit,java.util.List<Warp>> getWarpsPerLimit(LocalPlayer creator)
        Gets all warps created by the given LocalPlayer mapped under the applicable Limit. The map is guaranteed to include all limits that effect the given player. If no warp exists for a certain limit, get(Limit) will return an empty list.
        Parameters:
        creator - the creator
        Returns:
        a Map with all matching warps
